data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torrens, Javier, Fidalgo, Patricio, Fernandez, Celina, Punschke, Eduardo (2017): A new species of Hexacladia Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Encyrtidae) and new record of Hexacladiasmithii Ashmead as parasitoids of Dichelopsfurcatus (Fabricius) (Hemiptera, Pentatomidae) in Argentina. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 61: 75-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.61.20742, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.61.20742
